sentence.Network_en: It is only natural that he should resent you.
sentence.Network_cn: 他怨恨你是很自然的事。

sentence.Network_en: Many conscripts resent having to do their military service.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多应征入伍者对被迫服兵役愤愤不平。

sentence.Network_en: They resent what they see as bossiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对自己眼中那些专断蛮横的行为非常厌恶。

means.word_mean: 冒犯,对...感到不高兴,怨恨

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete French resentir, from re- (expressing intensive force) + sentir feel (from Latin sentire). The early sense was 'experience (an emotion or sensation)', later 'feel deeply', giving rise to 'feel aggrieved by'

entry.def: If you resent someone or something, you feel bitter and angry about them.

example.ex: She resents her mother for being so tough on her...
example.tran: 她怨恨母亲对她太严厉。

example.ex: I resent being dependent on her.
example.tran: 我很讨厌自己对她的依赖。

sentences.sentence: "She resents being paid less than her co-workers"

auth_sentence.content: I began to resent...a purposeless infringement of my freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content: I began to resent...a purposeless infringement of my freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I began to resent...a purposeless infringement of my freedom.

auth_sentence.content: Troubled European carmakers resent finding themselves in this situation.

auth_sentence.content: Some also resent the distant pan-European bureaucracy in Brussels.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some also resent the distant pan-European bureaucracy in Brussels.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息

re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排

re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点

re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬

sentiment感情+al……的→adj.多愁善感的
pre预先+sentiment感觉→n.预感,预觉
dissent[v.不同意,持异议]+sion→dissension意见不合
resent[v.忿恨,不满]+ment表名词→n.憎恨
scent=sent感觉→ n.气味，香味；香水 v.嗅猎；察觉

sentences.cn: 他怨恨他朋友所说的话。

jushi.english: She resented any criticism of her house.
jushi.chinese: 她愤恨对于她的房子的任何批评意见。
我很不喜欢你讲的那些话。
